name: Rayman Garden Plus
description:
Lost and Found the first mobile Rayman game... IS BACK!

Find the magic lums (blue balls) hidden in the Rayman Garden as quickly as possible. Advance using the arrow keys. Use your swords to fight the enemies: press on X to attack (Sword) and on C to carry out a super attack (Fire Sword). You can advance using the arrow keys. Each fight or obstacle will cost you a sword. Beware, as they are quickly used up. To save your swords, return walk mode by pressing on Z. Again, beware, if you come across an enemy without a sword, you'll lose two lives from a red monster, one life from a normal enemy. It is therefore up to you to manage your swords and avoid the enemies. One lum will win you one life. Watch out for the black hole which warrants a return penalty. But above all else you are being chased by your mortal enemy - Dark Rayman. Do not let yourself be caught or you're dead!

New features:

10 locations: Forest (Garden), Swamp (Garden), Mountain (Garden), Plant (Garden), Wood (Garden), Volcano (Garden), Candy (Rayman 1), Pirate Ship (Rayman 2: The Great Escape), Nuthouse (Rayman: The Animated Series) and Bowling (Rayman Bowling 2 by Ryemanni);

name: Rayman Lum'o'Grams
description:
Rayman Lum'o'Grams is a puzzle fan game for PCs running Microsoft Windows currently in development by Rayman Universe, or RUNI.

The game belongs to the Picross/Nonograms genre and uses both its own and assets of most 2D projects from Rayman series, with the exception of UbiArt games. The game was first announced at Rayman Alive 2022 as part of the RUNI Showcase segment presenting Rayman Universe projects, which featured a concept trailer. The project's World Premiere took place at Rayman Alive 2023, revealing most of the details of the game. The first public demo version has been announced for early 2024, but its released has been postponed.

name: Virgin Simulator
description: Virgin wants to find a girlfriend

description: Sin descripción

name: Smoked Fish And Cabbage
description: Sin descripción

name: SonKnuck Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: SonKnuck Adventure 2

name: Primeval
description:
Experience life as different dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures. Play as the plant eating herbivores, the meat-eating carnivores, and the fish-eating piscivores.

Roam the land, seas, and skies. Eat, grow, and survive in an unforgiving world filled with many species of creatures that can help you, be hunted, or hunt you.

Earn evolution points by eating, killing, and completing tasks. Spend those points to customize your creature's attributes such as damage or health.

Collect a hoard of items that can be used to strengthen your creatures, nests, and eggs.

62 playable species.

name: Regenti Rebelia
description: Adelia has never quite understood her place in the world—raised with lofty expectations and forced into a mold she's desperate to break. She often dreams of a different life of normalcy, self-expression, and a weight lifted off her shoulders. Two things stand in her way—her royal title and her overly protective personal knight.

name: How to Date an Entity (and stay alive)
description: This game is a Visual Novel game with a length of about 15 to 20 minutes (per ending—so it actually takes some time to get all of them). It’s about an MC who wakes up in their room and encounters a tall mysterious woman. He must date her to survive. The game incorporates elements of both Dating Sim and analog horror, featuring a total of 10 possible endings. All endings based on "Interest Meter", so you need to be aware of it.

name: Pico Drift
description: Explore the city as your ultimate drifting arena. Dodge traffic, outsmart the cops, and challenge your friends. Experience official campaign tracks and game modes, or create your own playgrounds. This is your world - drive it your way

name: Nullpomino
description:
NullpoMino is a cross-platform, open-source fan game written in Java providing three versions: One using Slick, another using sdljava, the last using Swing. The game also simulates many Tetris games, as well as the TGM series and a few fan games, and also contains a utility for creating your own custom rotation systems.

NullpoMino is one of the few Tetris games, official or fan-made, with a truly cross-platform online versus mode.

name: Swarm Racer 3000
description: Swarm racer seems to be as much a puzzle game as it is a racing game.

name: Chess Ultimate
description: Chess Ultimate reimagines the classic game of chess with draft-based strategy and colorful 3D visuals. Build your team from a roster of unique characters, each with special abilities, and face off against opponents in tactical battles. With online and cross-platform multiplayer, every match offers fresh challenges and endless strategic depth.

name: Go Hell Go: Tsukiotoshiteko - Limited Edition
description:
Box contents:
• Game "goHELLgo: Tsukiotoshiteko"
• Artbook
• Original Soundtrack
• Shop Entrance Curtain
• Systems Voice Collection
• Chest Strap
• Floor Lamp-style Memo Stand
• Lycee OVERTURE Promotional Card

name: Ducky Clicker
description: Discover the universe of Ducky Clicker, an idle game full of unique rubber ducks. Click, expand your collection, and unlock divine powers, quantum ducks, and more. Rule the world of ducks as you ascend to infinity!

name: Save Me My Hero
description: ’Save Me, My Hero’ is a defense game with roguelike elements. Complete your own battle style with the hero's various skills and special abilities.

name: Card Attack: Gabee's Roads
description: Card Attack is a Card Deck Building based roguelike game. Collect cards, enhance them with relics and skills, and defeat your enemies!

name: Little Adventurer Treasure Hunt
description: A game focused on object-finding. The story revolves around helping alien friends who have been forced to land on Earth due to an "accident". Assist them in searching for scattered items, parts, and their lost crew members across various locations.

name: Ortho Blaze
description: Sin descripción

name: Furry Exodus
description: Sin descripción

name: Una ad Astra
description: Una ad Astra is a turn-based tactical fantasy RPG, where you get to play not one, but two heroes. Mix and match skills from 7 different classes to defeat sneaky goblins and mighty dragons.

name: Inconceivable Rat Endeavour
description: Embark on a wacky rat's endeavour in this genre-bending hexagonal puzzler. Rotate hexes to make your way out of miserable sewers, collect inconceivable amounts of cheese, avoid deadly traps and prepare for silly surprises.

name: Winken
description: Winken: The rhythmic piano game where you read real sheet music, on a real score! Ready to rethink your definition of piano game and rhythm game? Beginner or Expert, get ready to discover something new with Winken: a game where you really play music.

name: DrillHead
description: Drill through the deeps of the Earth and fight against King Moles, Evil Skulls, Weird Tourists and more!

name: Pacifish: Recast
description: An incremental fishing management game with several mechanics to interact with and improve. It can be played both idly, or more actively to progress faster.

name: When Team3 Gets Bored
description: Sin descripción

name: Five Nights At Amendoca's
description: Five Nights At Amendoca's (or FNAA) is a Five Nights At Freddy's fangame created by furry productions inspired by the Amendo Gordo channel, the most scoundrel channel on YouTube

name: Sonic Stash
description: Sin descripción

name: BeyondSonic
description: Sin descripción

name: NekoSpin
description: The gaming-obsessed magical girl decides to save a world corrupted by monsters. Pull the cat charm, spin the slot machine on her wand, and defeat the dark creatures!

name: SonicVerse Adventures
description: Sin descripción

name: Roulette Rush
description: The setting is a demonic casino with bosses themed around different casino games- Black Jack, Bingo, Slot Machines, and yourself with a Roulette themed weapon. Earn chips, place bets, and become more powerful!

name: Harry McLinestrider
description: McLinestrider is a chill guy who really only cares about his pay and benefits. His job only has one rule. DONT. BE. LATE. If he doesn’t hurry, HIS LIFE WILL BE OVER. Don’t be scared though, as this isn’t his first time almost being late. He’ll make it.

name: Military Incremental Complex
description:
Make weapons, make money.

Start your own military industrial complex enterprise! Begin by making bullets by hand, then with machines, then acquire entire factories. Expand into making guns, tanks, planes, and even nukes. Research new products, faster and cheaper ways to make them, and better methods of making money. Enter the stock market to raise capital, buyout rival companies, or perform market manipulation. Lobby the government for fewer regulations, better contracts, and more demand for your products. Turn the entire economy into a weapons making machine, making you ludicrous amounts of money.

name: Sonic Madventure 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Shelldom
description: In Shelldom, snails worship alcohol—a drink they love but one that kills them. Their cults sacrifice their own for more, trapped in a doomed cycle. But legend speaks of the Holy Water, hidden atop a merciless tower. Can you climb, endure, and break the curse? Or will you fall like the rest?

name: Hatsukoi Monogatari
description: Following a brief prologue with adventure-like gameplay, the bulk of Hatsukoi Monogatari consists of managerial simulation along the lines of Princess Maker games, though with more limited options and no RPG elements. The player manages the hero's daily schedule, divided into two segments: school and home. Activities include studying, having conversations with students or teachers, taking part-time jobs, resting, talking on the phone, shopping, buying presents, etc. Each activity increases or decreases some of the hero's parameters. The overall level can be evaluated on a special screen, and the goal is to raise it by balancing the stats with various activities.

name: Zoku Hatsukoi Monogatari ~Shuugaku Ryokou~
description: Zoku Hatsukoi Monogatari: Shūgaku Ryokō is a mixture of adventure and "love simulation" - more specifically, first love. The player takes the role of a male student and can choose any time period between ground school to college. Every time period has four different girls that the hero can fall in love with. The player must choose one of those girls as the main love object. The setting is the same in every time period: the class goes on vacation to different places in Japan. Most of the game consists of traveling from place to place, trying to be at the right place the right time and make the right decision. The player must assemble a schedule for each location. It is possible to manage the player character's finances, as well as buy items that can be given to the girls.

name: Landorus Therian Dating Simulator
description: A humorous, and also heartwarming love story between an unassuming player and competitive Pokémon's fallen legendary fighter, Landorus-Therian.

name: Het Huis Anubis: Het geheim van Osiris
description: The residents of The House of Anubis need your help! This adventurous game takes you to an abandoned inn, a beautiful garden full of ancient artifacts, and even to distant Egypt. You embark on a miraculous journey through time and find yourself in the world of the original inhabitants of the House of Anubis: the Winsbruggen-van Hennegouwen couple and their daughter. Can you solve the puzzles, find the treasures, and uncover the Secret of Osiris?

name: Mechaknights Legends
description: As the pilot of a massive mechanical armor, you will face powerful dragons and dangerous creatures dwelling in the darkest corners of the world.

name: Dotu
description: A game that combines math with the challenge of logic-based puzzles. Place dots on the board to match the target sums of rows and columns. Each world brings new twists to test your brainpower.

name: Dimension Escape
description: Dimension Escape is a tactical card game. Choose your heroes wisely—will you pick a ninja pirate or a robo dinosaur? Equip them with powerful ability cards and defeat all who stand in your way.

name: Spared!
description: Be the last pin standing! Hop around and avoid a variety of unique bowlers with their eyes all set on one thing - striking you down.

name: Shadow Returns
description: Sin descripción

name: Badnik Hunt 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic vs. Mega Man
description: Sin descripción

name: Metal Sonic Quest 2: Return and Revenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Cup Heroes
description: A turn-based RPG with pachinko mechanics.

name: Pole Vault
description: You are a stretchy little newt who loves to pole vault.

name: Gigacrab: Getting Over The Meme
description: Reach the top of the world using only your muscular claws. Every fall will test your patience. Can you make it?

name: Sacrifices
description:
Rule and guide a mesoamerican village through the vicissitudes of everyday life in the heart of a ruthless jungle.

Manage a cute rural village, be the heartless divinity you always intended to be and suffer our debatable humor in this god-game-meets-town-sim.

Decide who is worthy of your tremendous powers, earn the faith of your followers, and gift them with divine knowledge to rebuild the great city that is now in ruins.

Welcome to a world where you live only through the faith of your followers! Keep them in line, but be careful, as they could lose faith and you may very well be just another forgotten god...

name: Courageous Reasoning Nori 9 Reasoning Tournament Sticking Nori
description: Sin descripción

name: Montezuma's Revenge: The 40th Anniversary Edition
description: The 1983 classic multi-room platformer Montezuma’s Revenge returns in 2.5D glory, and now Pedro’s adventure is bigger than ever with 100 tricky rooms to explore! For its 40th anniversary, what was once an unfinished game is now resurrected to match the full vision of creator Robert Jaeger. This time you can choose between male and female explorers, Pedro or his sister Rosita, to delve deep into the dangerous ruins and hunt for treasures untold!

name: NCORE
description:
This is a free PvPvE multi-arena shooter in the format of an entertainment show.

Fight alongside your teammates in a virtual multi-arena for the right to become NCORE champions! Your task is to eliminate opponents and collect as many coins as possible or prevent other teams from doing so. You can move between hexes, raid bosses, ambush other players, or charge straight into battle. Plan your strategy carefully and do whatever it takes to win in NCORE!

name: Project Neon
description: Project Neon is a new, vertical / TATE style Shoot 'Em Up (shmup), developed for the original Neo Geo MVS / AES platform. It features a 1-2 player mode, with all the bells and whistles of a classic shoot 'em up that you would expect, spiced up with some modern and unique concepts and game mechanics.

name: Rat Climber
description:
You are a rat. You must climb.
Reach the top, claim the cheese!

In Rat Climber, you only have one goal: reach the top of the world.
You must navigate vertical labyrinths and make daring jumps, but be careful; one false move and you go tumbling down.

Can you guide Ratty to the top of the world and reach cheese heaven? Try your skills in the best 3D ratformer ever made!

name: Kingdom Rush 5: Alliance - Colossal Dwarfare
description: Sin descripción

name: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Season 2
description: Season 02 is here, upending the new order of Avalon. Engage with a massive amount of new content, including five Multiplayer maps, more than six new weapons, a new Zombies map, limited time Valentine’s Day-themed modes, and more. Gear up and deploy to Season 02.

name: MultiVersus: Season 4
description: Get your guitars and best goth garb. It's time for the Goth Girl Season! Season 4 of MultiVersus has been summoned! Unlock Raven and Marceline through 2 separate battlepasses, and play on 2 new maps based Samurai Jack and Adventure Time.

name: Code Reactors
description: Build your own Magic Deck and set off on a quest in this magical battle-packed 2D-action RPG.

name: MultiVersus: Season 5
description: Season 5 marks the final update of MultiVersus before shutting down on May 30th, 2025. This season will include a free battlepass where you can unlock Aquaman, as well as a daily log-in that unlocks Lola Bunny.

name: AquaDream
description: Guide your anglerfish through intricate underwater mazes. Collect stars, solve puzzles, and avoid perilous obstacles. Experience a captivating deep-sea adventure filled with hidden treasures and mysteries in this immersive aquatic world.

name: Bot Hunter
description: Fast-paced roguelite shooter with modular weapons. Play as a vacuum cleaner bounty hunter. Use color theory to clean the galaxy of bot scum and collect rewards to pay your bills.

name: Rolling Macho: Tumbling to Earth
description: Rolling Macho: Tumbling to Earth is a rolling action game where you roll and squat your way back to Earth after being stranded in space.

name: Marching Order
description:
Take charge of an adorable (but disorderly) animal marching band in this addictive logic puzzle game!

You play as a stressed-out band leader rabbit whose job it is to organise the fussy marching band members into the correct sequence.

name: Mighty the Armadillo
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Needle & Thread
description: A tiny game about sewing.

name: The Problem With Golf
description: A short Bitsy essay written for a Deep Ecology: Environmental Ethics class. Based on an essay analyzing the relationship between golf, colonialism, and power.

name: Murphy's Minerals
description: Murphy's Minerals is a menu-driven, logic based educational game designed to teach players where to find and how to identify different types of minerals.

name: End of Line
description:
A game about learning how to die. Figure out how to thwart autonomous repair bots in this puzzle adventure.

Game available on Retro Game Crunch.

name: Gaia-ttack
description:
Gaia has summoned four champions to rise up and destroy the pillaging Sky Pirates. A beat 'em up platformer for up to four players.

Game available on Retro Game Crunch.

name: Take a piss like a woman
description: A game where you have a conversation while taking a piss.

name: Paradox Lost
description:
Abby crashes her plane, but stumbles upon a gun that shoots time travel! A metroidvania across three time periods.

Game available on Retro Game Crunch.

name: Wub-Wub Wescue
description:
A pug must brave the jungle and navigate its treacherous rhythms, all to rescue his master. An early 80’s arcade platformer.

Game available on Retro Game Crunch.

name: Brains & Hearts
description:
A two player card game that takes place inside Albert Einstein's dream. Play against the CPU or a friend.

Game available on Retro Game Crunch.

name: Shuten
description:
A samurai shoot 'em up for one or two players. Owari’s village is trampled as ancient gods awaken. He takes up sword to end them.

Game available on Retro Game Crunch.

name: Fairytale Symphony
description: A "definitive edition" of Fairytale Requiem, which comes bundled with Fairytale Encore, a bonus alternative scenario, and a compact release of the Visual Fanbook.

name: Kangaroo Court
description: Kangaroo Court is a chaotic, satirical courtroom simulator for 4-40 players. Play as Judge, Defendant, Prosecutor, or Defense Lawyer, with roles like Jury, News Crew, Police, and more. Defend or incriminate the defendant, vote, and decide their fate based on their crimes!

name: Dumbot
description: Dumbot is a retro style hyper casual scrolling platformer game. Fluid and challenging gameplay designed to entertain. Amazing graphics, easy controls and two big worlds to explore providing you with many hours of fun playing time. Also no annoying in app purchases.

name: Forbidden Solitaire
description: Forbidden Solitaire is a card-slashing horror game about unearthing the contents of a cryptic 1995 CD-ROM that should have never existed. From the creators of Ancient Enemy and Home Safety Hotline.

name: Escape from Moonbase Alpha
description: A 3D graphical adventure in which you must find the Doctor and give him ten bags of gold to pay for your transport off of the moonbase. You will not be able to pick up the bags of gold if there is a monster in the room with you. In an emergency, you can take a Hulk pill which doubles your strength for five seconds and allows you to walk through the walls (at a cost of 100 strength units). There are many friendly and unfriendly monsters in the adventure and you will soon learn which ones to fight and which ones to avoid.

name: Drinking in the hot spring!
description: In this humor-filled human drama, you take on the role of the leader of a hot spring drinking club, spending enjoyable moments with a diverse group of members from different ages and backgrounds. As you bond with them, you’ll support them through their worries and troubles, sometimes with a little help from alcohol, and help to heal their hearts.

name: Battle Run
description: Battle Run is an online multiplayer game in real time where you compete in races against users worldwide to add up as many points as possible.

name: Hatsukoi Monogatari
description: Hatsukoi Monogatari is a life sim/love adventure game and a remake of the 1993 PC game of the same title. While the story and gameplay are largely identical to the original version, this remake adds a new character — the angel Liliana — along with new events and endings. The artwork has also been completely redone in a different style, with new character designs by a different artist than the original release.

name: Math Muncher
description: Math Muncher is a puzzle game where you push blocks to manipulate their values. In each level, the Math Muncher is hungry and demands blocks of a certain value. Keeping the Muncher fed and satisfied to advance to the next level and safely make your way back to civilization.

name: Super Metroid Arcade
description: A ROM hack of Super Metroid that turns the game into a replayable "arcade" game with kills based points as you go through random rooms and try to rack up a highscore. Multiple difficulties are offered, and it can be played with a time limit, endlessly, or to a set number of rooms cleared.

name: Berrywitched!
description: Berrywitched! is a lovely twisted game where you, our protagonist, are lost within a forest that is supposedly cursed. You pass out, only to be awoken by a cute girl claiming to be a Strawberry Witch.

is now available on Nintendo Switch!

name: Sugoro Quest: Dice Heroes
description: Roll the dice and fight! SUGORO Quest: The Quest of Dice Heroes comes to the West for the first time! This is a board game-style turn-based RPG where dice will decide your fate! In English for the first time, it features new functions such as save state, screen filters, gallery and cheats.

name: Toy Tale: The Forgotten Factory
description: This visual novel follows a group of toys who, after being forgotten by children, begin a journey in search of a legendary place: The Forgotten Factory.

name: FriendShapes
description: A jumpscare-free abstract horror existential crisis of a lite-RPG. Explore Digressions - areas that continue longer than they should with sets of randomized text events and map variations for a differing experience each time. Features a unique non-violent interaction system with various Entities.

name: Nusnur
description: Explore the multiverse with different versions of NUSNURs where every universe has its own mechanics, style, story, and lore. Observe how their lives connect and how everything ends.

name: The JerryMaya Detective Agency
description: Unleash your inner detective in The JerryMaya Detective Agency, a puzzle platforming adventure for kids and families! Based on the beloved Swedish children’s books, this interactive mystery game invites young detectives to solve crimes, uncover clues, and explore the quirky town of Valleby.

name: Undertale: Thanatos!
description:
MT EBOTT. 202X
Legends say that those who climb the mountain never return.
You, as the new fallen human, possess the power to manipulate the world.
But your actions have shown such power can easily corrupt your mind.
Your own curiosity, resulted in a mass extinction. Repeating the same events over and over again.
But nothing is meant to last forever.
Your very own power has consumed you. And now consequences of your actions are finally crawling up your back.

Are you ready?

name: Norma
description: "noRma" immerses you in the role of private detective Augustus Pinkerton. The game takes place in June 2240, your mission is to unravel the mystery surrounding the disappearance of Norma X, a 19-year-old young woman.

name: Deltarune: Internal Demons
description:
One day, the trio found themselves caught between getting caught from the teachers around the corner, or risking everything and jumping into the strange grey door. Leaving their school and world behind.

After a long fall Scuta wakes alone, with only one option to go, he has to proceed further, finding his friends and leaving the new dark world.

name: Another Round
description:
Another Round is a deckbuilder / slots-style game. Your goal is to stay in business and make your cyberpunk cafe into a social hub which everyone in the community enjoys.

There is no timer or countdown clock putting pressure on you to make decisions quickly; you will not need to do a lot of math or rely on perfect play to have a good time.

name: Breakout Beyond
description: Breakout is back! In this neon-drenched take on the classic, you’ll need to literally break through each puzzle by clearing bricks to breach the final goal. Rack up a combo and create spectacular light shows alone or with a friend.

name: One Last Job
description: One Last Job is a moddable team management game, where you work to build your reputation as a fixer by successfully completing jobs with your crew.

name: Melon Clicker
description: Click the melon to accumulate points. Ideal for short breaks or unwinding.

name: Robin Hood: Sherwood Defenders
description: As the legendary Robin Hood, fight the Sheriff's forces in the open field by defending the Merry Men's allies from invasions in this tower defense game. Produce resources, build up your fortifications, place units, and then join in the battle yourself!

name: Kings & Savages
description: A skill based auto battler. Easy to learn, hard to master. Little time commitment as games last a minute. Inspired by Chess and Dota.

name: Tales of Valoris: Swallow's Defenders
description: Swallow’s Keep is a place of great prosperity; however, not all lands share in its wealth, and it has caught the eye of ambitious adversaries. Can you defend your home against the bandits?

name: Color-A-Cube
description: Dive into a relaxing, color-filled escape with Color A Cube. This immersive coloring experience lets you explore and bring voxel worlds to life, one cube at a time. Unwind and tap into your creative flow as each brushstroke reveals vibrant, voxel-based environments and characters.

name: Yopaz Icestar
description:
This puzzle game features 40 levels in 3 worlds & a Level Editor !

You play as a little character named Yopaz and you must collect all the stars in the universe, but the vacuum of space forces you to slide indefinitely when you run in one direction.
Only an ice wall will stop you in your tracks! With this unusual constraint, you will need to collect all stars on each level.

The world "Advanced" provides additional features for hardcore players.
You will be able to change your color and collect stars of the corresponding color! Your color will also allow you to go through teleports, direction changers, or even protect you from enemies!

The Level Editor allow you to unleash your imagination and creates dozens of custom levels !

name: Git Gud
description: Git Gud is a fast-paced, 3D precision platformer designed for 1-4 players. If you love speedrunning, bunny hopping, and intense platforming challenges, this is your game.

name: EGA Coloring Book
description: EGA COLORING BOOK is a computer coloring book. It allows children to use over 500 colors and patterns to color the pictures. Children, age 3 and up, will enjoy bringing the pictures to life with color. Very young children will need adult assistance to use this program. EGA COLORING BOOK will only work on EGA or VGA equipped systems. In addition, the display adapter must have at least 128K of display memory. Use of a mouse input device is optional but recommended.

name: Big Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Heise Biji
description: This story is about when the "the seekers of the way" confront the many complexities facing the end of the world, where there is no distinction between absolute good and evil, they rely on the values of their own beliefs to choose a path that suits their will. Possibly, it can also be said that the game's protagonist, a "saint" who came to this world from the ocean, symbolizes the "cradle of life" and death's final destination. He accepts these destined, indefinite calamitous trials to understand the truth of "life and will", thus venturing on the never-ending journey of no return to become a transcendent... The content of the work attempts to explore includes: "environmental crises", "religious conflicts", "a return to nature", "the awakening of the ego", "totem banquets", and so on.

description: Reclaim your destiny. Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny returns with higher resolution graphics and modernised controls to perform issen critical counter attacks and intense swordplay. Experience this dramatic revenge story set in Feudal Japan.

name: Downtown Club
description: Downtown Club is a racing game with full virtual controls and exciting driving feedback, built from the ground up for standalone VR. Grab wheel, shifter and handbrake, take full control of your car and become a motorsport champion!

name: The Key
description:
Meet Anna. Anna doesn’t remember her past, but she has vivid dreams about it. In every one of her dreams, there is a mysterious Key. Will you be able to unlock the mystery behind The Key without sacrificing too much?

The Key is a magical realism experience that will take you on a journey through dreams, facing challenges and difficult decisions, leading to a shocking reveal. The Key is NOT a video game. So relax, and let the story guide you.

name: Spyfall
description:
Welcome to Spyfall, a pulse-pounding multiplayer game where trust is scarce, and the stakes are high. Set in a dynamic urban environment teeming with life, Spyfall puts you and your friends in the middle of a thrilling game of deception, strategy, and survival.
In a city alive with NPCs, five players take on unique roles. One becomes the relentless police officer, tasked with uncovering spies hidden among the bustling crowd. The other four assume the roles of citizens—spies with a mission. Their goal? Complete covert tasks across the city without raising suspicion and, above all, avoid getting caught.

name: Taylordle
description: Taylordle.xyz is a daily Taylor Swift song guessing game where players have 8 guesses to get the correct song."

name: Battle Run
description:
Ready, set, RUN! Welcome to Battle Run! The adrenaline-pumping party racing game loved by millions of fans is back!

From the studio behind Tap Titans 2 and the popular Beat The Boss franchise, comes the return of long-awaited and fan-favourite real-time running multiplayer game - Battle Run!

Escape wicked rockets, evade spinning axes, and navigate past sneaky hazards - it's the ultimate race to the finish line!

Party up and play with your friends in an action-packed race and charge into first place! Become a racing legend as you outrun your opponents and compete in real-time multiplayer battles!

With runner’s like Ryder and his volcanic rain, Dust’s high-speed skateboard, and Macie’s explosive leap, it’s an attack blitz waiting to happen!

Revamped with all-new Runners, explosive items, and racing across vibrant worlds, this is Battle Run like never before.

name: Sonic Wings Reunion
description:
Sonic Wings Reunion is a sequel to the arcade-style shooter SONIC WINGS. The previous version was sold in 1998.

Choose from 8 characters and destroy the mysterious organization “Fatamornagana” that has progressed into the modern world. The scenario changes depending on the combination of characters.

The first new Sonic Wings (Aero Fighters) game in 26 years, with original staff members from the series involved in its planning, production, and oversight. This all-new installment in the classic vertical-scrolling shoot ’em up series is designed for all fans of the genre to enjoy.

name: War
description:
WAR, Grow's famous strategy game, now has 2 boards for you to play in electrifying battles!

Classic Game: Feel like a real general. Aim for your goal and carefully define your strategy. Attack at the right time, protect your borders and defend your territories. Dominate entire continents, invade and conquer opposing territories. But make sure you evaluate your moves carefully because, just like in great wars, poorly planned attacks can bring down great powers while the right strategy can turn small armies into great empires!

Roman Empire Game: With internal conflicts and barbarian invasions on the increase, the time has come for the CAESARS, the Roman Emperors, to rise. Be a true strategist in command of entire Roman legions and conquer the greatest empire the world has ever seen.

Gather your friends and play the digital version of this classic game. The app makes the game much faster and more dynamic, making the matches last much less time than in the board version.

name: Laser Panic
description: Play as a four legged robot. Try to collect as many gold diamonds as possible. Dodge lasers and escape through the sliding doors to the next level.

name: Lost Egg: The Hard Boiled
description: A hard-action adventure game depicting the love and resilience of a boiled egg. Roll through various stages accompanied by poignant music, all aiming for the ultimate destination: the pot. "I may be a soft-boiled newbie, but I'm going on an adventure to become a tough, hard-boiled egg...!"

name: .Atorb.
description: .atorb. is a small indie puzzle game in which you shoot a series of balls into rings orbiting around a center mass.

name: Radical Sonic
description: Sin descripción

name: Panzer Dragoon Voyage Record
description:
Panzer Dragoon Voyage Record is an upcoming virtual reality title currently being developed by Wildman inc. it is a compilation that will allow players to experience various episodes from the original Panzer Dragoon Sega Saturn games.

Panzer Dragoon Voyage Record was unveiled on March 10, 2020, the 25th anniversary of the original Panzer Dragoon. The game was originally scheduled to be released in the 2020 Japanese Fiscal Year (which went until March 2021). However, its crowdfunding was delayed until 2021, so the current release window is unknown.

The game will be published by Wildman Inc., with Sega having no investments in the project; Watanabe has accepted the risks, arguing that if Sega was financially involved and the game failed, it would damage the Panzer Dragoon franchise, which he wants to avoid.

name: Sonic Eternal Rings
description: Sin descripción

name: Aksun
description: Aksun is an action roguelite based on Korean shamanism and the afterlife.

name: Cloudheim
description: Ragnarok shattered the world, the gods have chosen you to shape the next one. Cloudheim is a cooperative action RPG blending crafting with chaotic physics-based combat. Gather your allies, craft your weapons, and upgrade your shop in the sky to bring harmony to a broken realm.

name: Saci: The Cursed Hunt
description: Step into the heart of the Amazon rainforest and uncover the secrets behind Saci: The Cursed Hunt - an upcoming survival horror game rooted in Brazilian folklore.

name: A Forest Tale: Porasy
description:
Embark on a journey through a new mythological realm as Porasy, an Indigenous warrior. Explore uncharted landscapes, unleash the power of Muiraquitãs, unravel your story, and vanquish the Seven Legendary Beasts to carve your own legend. Are you ready to dive into this epic adventure?

Porasy is an indie platformer that combines the thrill of classic 2D action with the rich, untold stories of the Tupi-Guarani mythology. Inspired by childhood favorites like Sonic and MegaMan, Porasy brings a fresh challenge to the platforming genre, immersing players in a dangerous, atmospheric world of Brazilian folklore.

name: Superstition BlackCat
description: A roguelite where superstitions take shape as items! Face enemies, collect drops with negative effects that can be traded for advantages. Explore always different rooms, with challenges inspired by beliefs that make us think twice before taking a risk.

name: Super Mario: Blue Twilight
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: The House in Fata Morgana: Remaid of Dreams
description: Remaid of Dreams is a project focused on recreating the experience of the game "The House in Fata Morgana: Dreams of the Revenants Edition" on Steam and Android, by adding numerous new features and bonuses for a more comprehensive experience of the entire The House in Fata Morgana saga.

name: Cardtographer
description:
Cardtographer is a stylized 3D-Graphics Roguelike Deckbuilder, in which you choose one or more Champions to fight the evil, which has overcome the lands.

During your adventure your chosen champions gain gold and experience during the fights and enhance their deck to overcome their opposing enemy finally.

You also can ally with your frineds in online coop.

name: Satisfaction Drone
description:
The party has ended.

Orion & Artemis, an odd pair consisting of a large cyborg and her still-human friend, go home together after a pleasant night out. Orion is wrapped around Artemis’s little finger once again. But what happens when she’s wound too tight?

SATISFACTION DRONE is a short & messy kinetic story with uncomfortable friends-with-benefits lesbianism and semiviolent robot sex. Adults only!

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing 24 Gold Edition
description: iRacing presents the Official Game of The World of Outlaws, featuring the World of Outlaws Sprint Car, Late Models and Super DIRTcar Big Block Modifieds, as well as 8 additional series including the all-new Micro Sprints, and many others.

name: Project Aeroes
description: Sin descripción

name: Bumble Brawlers
description: Bumble Brawlers is an exhilarating top-down shooter that lets you dive into chaotic battles with fully customizable characters, unique companions, and powerful upgrades. Enter a world where survival is your only goal as you navigate dungeons, face endless enemy waves, and conquer a series of challenging maps with wave-based combat.

name: Nak
description: Become a ghost to save your family from ghosts. Nak is a story driven platformer with arena combat. Enter the world of Nak. Here your reflexes and analysis will be tested as you traverse vast physical and spiritual realms and square off against traditional Thai ghosts. How long will it be until you can no longer distinguish yourself from the monsters you face?

name: Shawarma King
description:
Celebrating 20 Years of "Falafel King" with a Modern, Flavorful Twist!

Welcome to Shawarma King, where you’ll discover what it truly takes to become the undisputed ruler of the street food empire!

Transform your small shawarma stand into a culinary empire while navigating the challenges of rising taxes, demanding customers, and unpredictable suppliers. Inspired by the classic Israeli game, "Falafel King," this modern homage comes with a new twist, tons of humor, and plenty of challenges.

Will you succeed in turning your small shawarma stand into a culinary empire spanning cities? Or will you end up under investigation by the tax authorities?

name: Windah Horror Adventure
description: In this 3D top-down horror game, you play as Windah Basudara, a popular Indonesian YouTuber who gets trapped in a world of Indonesian urban legends. Your goal is to escape and survive the game's many obstacles, including traps and bosses in the form of Indonesian ghosts.

name: Baba Yaga
description: A turn-based roguelike game of strategic combat and sinister magic. Decimate the king’s loyalist forces, grow your powers, and discover the reimagined origin story of Baba Yaga, the most feared witch of Slavic folklore!

name: Project Thea
description: A dark, strategy-survival RPG blending retro-futuristic urban fantasy with Slavic folklore. Rebuild your colony, explore the post-apocalyptic wasteland, and engage in tactical card-based combat. Immerse yourself in a story-rich adventure with branching narratives, playable solo or in 2-player co-op.

name: Witch’s Gaze: The Vanishing Village
description: Embark on a mystical quest that blends Slavic folklore with arcane witchcraft, uncover hidden secrets, and rescue a village lost to the shadows in this magical detective visual novel. Oh, and never forget your cat - he might save you!

name: League of Tanks: Global War
description: Every player begins with a level 1 Tank, there are many ways to increase the level of Tanks buying or farming, the game offers for new players the chance to obtain at least a level 4 tank which Is good to reach the max level king. it's all simple to understand inside and also how to add empowerement tools for win easily also against top players.

name: Black Raven
description: Black Raven is a dark 2.5D action-adventure rooted in Slavic Folklore set in 14th-century Eastern-Europe. Play as Ivan, a man consumed by vengeance after a brutal raid shatters his family. Journey through grim landscapes and fight brutal enemies in this dark tale of loss, rage, and resilience.

name: Sacred
description: Sacred is a free port of the game "Sacred" from a personal computer to mobile phones with Java applet support, released on June 22, 2004.

name: Sonic Mode: Recoil
description: Sin descripción

name: Angel's Lullaby
description:
Angel's Lullaby takes place during the game's opening introduction, back during the Human and Monster War. Expanding on the lore, meta narrative and core themes of the original games, Angel's aims to enrich the Undertale world by mixing both the old and new.

Combining both an open-world and linear story-line, Angel's is an ambitious fangame with a large story to tell. There's three main "Acts," each with it's own main area that follows a story.

name: Unizone's Underswap: Distrust Sans
description: A take on the events of the Swap version of the famous "Disbelief Papyrus" Alternative Timeline

name: Two Men Go On A Date And Don't Fall In Love
description: but maybe they can find something else in common?

name: Crossovertale
description:
Play as Frisk all grown up after the ending of Undertale.

FIGHT or SPARE your way through a brand new world, where characters from all across the video game multiverse come together and wage battle

name: The Creature in my Dreams
description:
Dreams are so strange, almost like a movie that cannot be skipped.
No sense of direction or rationale.
It's a place where one must face true fear.
This house is where it all started.
With no way to look away from the movie,
I must face what is to come...

name: Bury Me With The Rain
description: Bury me with the rain is an interactive short story about the life, friendship and struggle of Jean and Avery. Follow their journey of hardship, joy and heartfelt conversation as they try to find meaning for their own lives.

name: I Am Feeling Things Too
description: This game tells the story of Lydia and Ophelia - two lesbians who experience their first date in person, after they have been talking online for a while. The scene takes place in Ophelia's place, after having had a date on a café in i am feeling things.

name: Reactoryx
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of intrigue and investigation in “Reactoryx,” a unique detective game featuring hidden object searches, challenging puzzles, and uncovering mysteries that could change the course of history.

name: Shieven
description: Enter the enigmatic Luminora Hospital, where, as a researcher on the brink of ruin, you take on a case that will test your courage. Amidst dark rumors, you will uncover terrifying secrets that have caused those who dared to go too far to disappear.

name: Omashu Dash
description: Dash down a series of tunnels and aim to complete the level as fast as you can!

name: Fellowship
description: FELLOWSHIP is a multiplayer online dungeon adventure set in an exciting fantasy setting, with endlessly scaling dungeon runs.

name: Night Striker Gear
description: A brand new entry to the series, NIGHT STRIKER GEAR revitalizes the sprite scaling pseudo-3D style with polished graphics. The new GEAR System gives an added depth to the gameplay without sacrificing the intuitiveness. Feeling the rush of fast-paced music, strike through the night once more!

name: Lore Masters: Pathfinder
description: A Pathfinder trivia game drawing from the lore, rules, and mechanics of the Pathfinder Second Edition tabletop roleplaying game.

name: Desktop Cat Cafe
description: Build your dream cat cafe in this tiny cozy management sim that lives at the bottom of your screen! Unlock exciting new recipes, decorate your space with our wide variety of goodies, and hire cute staff to take care of the cafe while you're doing other things.

name: Game of Thrones: Legends
description: Winter is Coming in Game of Thrones: Legends free match 3 puzzle RPG. Assemble your team of Champions with characters from Game of Thrones and House of the Dragon! Collect Lord Jon Snow, Mother of Dragons Daenerys Targaryen, Tyrion Lannister, Rhaenyra Targaryen and more. Lead them to battle as you travel Westeros, where dragon games, fantasy, and strategy collide. The fight against the Long Night begins now in this free puzzle RPG.

name: The Sims 4: Cozy Kitsch Kit
description: Embrace vibrant colors and mid-century modern design with The Sims 4 Cozy Kitsch Kit. Inspired by the 60s and the 70s, this collection of living room items features bold color and pattern combinations, stylish surfaces, and cute décor with delightful character. Add subtle accents to your room, or make a statement with every piece. Created by myshunosun.

name: The Sims 4: Sweet Slumber Party Kit
description: Look cute even when the venue of your party is your own bedroom with The Sims 4 Sweet Slumber Party Kit. The pastel colors, fluffy fabrics, adorable designs, and patterns will make you feel like you’re in a dream. Complete your sleepwear attire with cute nail designs, fuzzy socks and slippers, and fun skincare items. Created by Trillyke.

name: The Sims 4: Comfy Gamer Kit
description: Settle in for a cozy time at the computer with The Sims 4 Comfy Gamer Kit*. With this collection you’ll craft warm, inviting spaces that feel personal with a large desk, playful clutter items, and of course a comfy gaming chair. This kit was created in collaboration with Lilsimsie to be fun and relaxing with subtle references to The Sims.

name: The Sims 4: Secret Sanctuary Kit
description: Indulge in iconic fashion and enchanting décor with The Sims 4 Secret Sanctuary Kit. Create a luxurious space full of opulent furniture concealed behind a secret passage in a bookcase. When you’re inside your hideaway, let the world melt away as you relax on your chaise lounge or try on polished Italian-inspired fashions in your floor-length mirror.

name: The Sims 4: Casanova Cave Kit
description: Impress guests with a modern entertainment space and suave fits from The Sims 4 Casanova Cave Kit. This laid-back masculine fashion will have Sims looking confident, and the contemporary style of your den’s décor — a stylish bar, sleek coffee table, and more — will guarantee the right atmosphere, whether it’s game night or date night.

name: The Sims 4: Business Chic Kit
description: Give your Sims a professional edge with chic and stylish outfits from The Sims 4 Business Chic Kit*. From tailored suits to elegant dresses, Sims will feel confident and fashionable. Complete the look with sleek shoes and fancy accessories for an extra touch of class. The Business Chic Kit ensures Sims always look up to the task. Created by Madlen.

name: The Sims 4: Refined Living Room Kit
description: Embrace elegance and sophistication with The Sims 4 Refined Living Room Kit*. With a clever mix of modern and retro furniture, you can create the perfect base. Add extra personality with unique and chic decor pieces. And voilà, you’ll have a living room worthy of a design magazine. Created by Pierisim.

description: This game is a story-driven, narrative 3D flight exploration game in which you control a little bee on its journey to find a new home.

name: Shadow Prisoner
description:
"Shadow Prisoner" is a 2D fighting game with simple controls that allow you to perform exhilarating combos.

You can play with 25 characters (9 will be added for free, and one is a collaboration character that will be paid DLC).

Even if you have no experience with fighting games, you can use the simple mode to play like an experienced fighting gamer just by repeatedly pressing buttons.

There are story mode and survival mode for single player, and versus mode and network mode for competitive play.

Network mode has a zero-latency netcode that supports rollback.

If you are playing in Japan, you can play with the same input sensation as if you were playing next to someone in Japan.

In addition, Epsilon mode, a fighting action game where you shoot each other with a barrage of bullets, exclusive to the Steam version, will be added.

name: Aralez
description: This game is based on aralez from Armenian mythology, winged canines that lick the wounds of the dead in order to revive them. Explore each level and do minigames to revive the fallen.

name: Island Trouble
description: Sin descripción

name: Crime Opera II: The Floodgate Effect
description:
Experience a new chapter in the mafia tale surrounding the Gallos family! This story begins 9 years after the original. Xander Gallo is now bitter, alone and out of control. He’s causing problems for not only other families within the syndicate but also for younger Gallo members as well. Those who remained behind to continue the family legacy are soon forced to take sides with or against Xander Gallo, while others who have seemingly moved on with their lives are pulled back in against their will.

This is a tale of loyalty and deceit, murder and survival, as well as the strength or frailty of familial bonds. As a visual novel, Crime Opera II: The Floodgate Effect allows players the option of witnessing events in linear “kinetic” fashion or to affect how the narrative progresses by making key decisions along the way, all depicted with meticulously hand-drawn character portraits, a wide variety of scenes and scenarios to explore, original backgrounds and a soundtrack to fit the brooding and dangerous atmosphere.

name: CCSS07: 64 Squares of Purple
description: Crispy Chicken Chillzone discord server came together once more for a speedmap event. This time we have purple hue-shifted palette. All 256 lines had to be at 90 degrees to each other, and using 64 grid. The result is 36 maps, split into 4 episodes - castle, space, flesh, jungle.

name: High Rise
description: Highrise is a puzzle game where the player has to construct a tower out of blocks. The player controls a character called Barnaby who moves under five chutes full of blocks. From these the player picks blocks and moves them to the springboard where they are strategically positioned. Then the blocks are sent to the building area where they are stacked over the previous selection of blocks. Once the constructed tower reaches the required height, Barnaby will use it to climb up to a ladder at the top of the screen that leads to the next level. Picking the right blocks at the right position is necessary or the tower will be unstable and collapse. The game is on time and for each new level the player has less time available. There is also an instructor mode where the player can play without the time restriction.

name: Oxide: Survival Island
description:
Here you are, alone on the abandoned island, where everything can kill you. Cold, starving, predators, enemies: are you strong enough to tackle all these dangers?
Now stop, breathe and plan. Step 1: gather resources and create tools. Step 2: build a shelter and make some attire. Step 3: craft weapons, chase animals and procure food. Don’t forget about other players inhabiting this island. Make allies to fight alongside! Ready? Steady, Go! Do your best to stay alive! Good luck!

name: Kakyuusei 2
description:
Kakyūsei 2 is a dating sim and the sequel to 1996's Kakyūsei, itself a spin-off of the Dōkyūsei series.

The player is placed in the shoes of a student (default name: Oriya Rouma) during his last year of high school, as he is trying to find a girlfriend before graduation. Over the course of the story, he meets and bounds with nine eligible bachelorettes from his school, and can eventually chose to romance one of them.

Much like its predecessors, the gameplay centers around Oriya exploring his school, his local neighborhood, and the city, during which he can enter restaurants, shops, cafés, houses, etc. and potentially encounter the nine dateable girls and learn more about them through having conversations with them. The nature of these conversations usually depends on which location the girl is found at in and tends to feature multiple answers; in most cases these answers will either advance or hinder the progression of the relationship with the girl in question depending on the player's choices, leading to new story events. The game also features an internal clock and calendar, with some events, such as holiday celebrations or birthdays, only happening at certain times or on certain dates.

These two systems often times interact, with information given through conversations becoming relevant later down the line - most prominently, the girl in question can give a hint to their tastes in gifts, and if the player later gives them their desired item on their birthdays, it will greatly increase their approval of you.

Also like its predecessors, the game features scenes with nudity and explicit sexual situations.

[From MobyGames]

description: Our ship has suffered an unknown disaster and has been forced to dock on the side of this planet, and all you have to do is lead us to repair the ship and continue its voyage, however, the danger is getting closer and closer without our knowledge......

name: Oplero
description: Soar your way through 4 worlds and defeat fearsome bosses on the search for your lost friend. Discover the true nature of the world and reconnect.

name: Only False
description: Only False is a party game that blends bluffing and strategy, spiced up with a dash of dark humor. In Only False, a game for those who can’t get enough lies, you’ll sometimes lie like a politician, and sometimes think as strategically as Sun Tzu.

name: Hero's Odyssey
description: Awaken on the mysterious island of Damatheia with a Godly mission in your backlog. Forge bonds with unlikely allies, make life-altering choices, and battle the undead in this Visual Novel filled with secrets, minigames and multiple endings. What truths will you uncover... and at what cost?

name: Wuthering Waves: Waves Sing, and the Cerulean Bird Calls
description:
Version 2.1 of Wuthering Waves, including:
• New characters: Phoebe and Brant
• New areas: Riccioli Islands and Vault Underground
• New story quests
• New endgame content: Whimpering Wastes
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Sonic Velocity
description: Sin descripción

name: Grove Fisher
description: A relaxing idle game about fishing. Discover dozens of fishes and treasures! Spend your resources on growing your operation and unlocking new varieties of underground life! Achieve goals, buy skills, and mutate rare fish to improve your profits!

name: Sonic Velocity
description: Sin descripción

name: Nightmare Kart: The Old Karts
description: An upcoming free expansion to Nightmare Kart with a brand new mini-campaign, racers, karts, tracks, power-ups, and game modes.

name: Akabos
description: Do you hate squares? Then this game is for you! After all, the dog also hates squares. Help the dog to destroy all the squares!
